text.19_Chapter, 11_Verse, 0_Comment: Honoring one's parents is next to [the commandment to observe] Shabbat to tell you that just as one is obligated to respect Shabbat one is obligated to honor one's parents.
text.8_Chapter, 28_Verse, 0_Comment: The thunder will cease, and there will be no more hail: However it didn't say about the thunder that it will be no more, because it will be by matan torah.
text.14_Chapter, 0_Verse, 0_Comment: "They sang." [The letter] Yud songs. There are ten songs. The Sea .the Well. Moses. Joshua. Deborah. Hanna. David. Solomon. Hezekiah. And the song of the future.
